original_text: Oh that my head were waters, and mine eyes a fountain of tears, that I might weep day and night for the slain of the daughter of my people!
korean_text: 어찌하면 내 머리는 물이 되고 내 눈은 눈물 근원이 될꼬 죽임을 당한 딸 내 백성을 위하여 주야로 울리로다

sentences.original_text: Oh that my head were waters
and mine eyes a fountain of tears
that I might weep day and night
for the slain of the daughter of my people
